channel.title: Contacts on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Contacts on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: Filter Contacts
item.description: Preconditions PrestaShop installed Login with admin BO account Steps Step Description Expected result go to ‘Shop parameters>Contact’ page title contains ‘Contacts’ reset filter Total of contacts > 0 filter by ‘id_contact’ ‘2’ Number of contacts < total of contacts all rows column ‘id_contact’ contains ‘2’ reset filter Number of contacts after reset = total of contacts filter by ‘name’ ‘Customer service’ Number of contacts < total of contacts

item.title: CRUD Contact
item.description: Preconditions Having a shop installed locally Go to the BO and connect with an admin account Steps Step Description Expected result go to ‘Shop parameters > Contact’ page page title contains ‘Contacts’ reset all filters Total of contacts > 0 go to add new contact page page title contains ‘Add new’ Create contact (faker data) Successful message is displayed

item.title: Bulk actions
item.description: Preconditions Having a shop installed locally Go to the BO and connect with an admin account Steps Step Description Expected result go to ‘Shop parameters > Contacts’ page page title contains ‘Contacts’ reset all filters Total of contacts > 0 Create 2 contacts Number of contacts after creation = total of contacts + 2 filter list by title 2 contacts in list are displayed delete contacts by bulk actions successful message is displayed reset filter Number of contacts after deletion = total of contacts

item.title: Sort Contacts
item.description: Preconditions PrestaShop installed Login with admin BO account Steps Step Description Expected result go to ‘Shop parameters > Contacts’ page page title contains ‘Contacts’ reset all filters Total of contacts > 0 Sort By id_contact desc list is sorted by id_contact desc (3 -> 2 -> 1) Sort By name asc list is sorted by name asc
